item.name: Number of Monitors
item.description: Number of Monitors configured in Stone cluster

item.description: Number of OSDs in Stone cluster

item.description: Total number of IN OSDs in Stone cluster

item.description: Total number of UP OSDs in Stone cluster

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in Stone cluster

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in pg_temp state

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in undersized state

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in backfilling state

item.description: Total number of Placement Groups in degraded state

item.description: Total number of pools in Stone cluster

item.name: Stone OSD avg fill
item.description: Average fill of OSDs

item.description: Maximum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.description: Minimum amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Stone OSD avg PGs
item.description: Average amount of PGs on OSDs

item.name: Stone backfill full ratio
item.description: Backfill full ratio setting of Stone cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.description: Full ratio setting of Stone cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Stone OSD Apply latency Avg
item.description: Average apply latency of OSDs

item.description: Maximum apply latency of OSDs

item.description: Miniumum apply latency of OSDs

item.name: Stone OSD Commit latency Avg
item.description: Average commit latency of OSDs

item.description: Maximum commit latency of OSDs

item.description: Minimum commit latency of OSDs

item.name: Stone OSD max fill
item.description: Percentage fill of maximum filled OSD

item.name: Stone OSD min fill
item.description: Percentage fill of minimum filled OSD

item.name: Stone nearfull ratio
item.description: Near full ratio setting of Stone cluster as configured on OSDMap

item.name: Overall Stone status
item.description: Overall Stone cluster status, eg HEALTH_OK, HEALTH_WARN of HEALTH_ERR

item.name: Overal Stone status (numeric)
item.description: Overal Stone status in numeric value. OK: 0, WARN: 1, ERR: 2

item.name: Stone Read bandwidth
item.description: Global read bandwidth

item.name: Stone Read operations
item.description: Global read operations per second

item.name: Total bytes available
item.description: Total bytes available in Stone cluster

item.name: Total bytes
item.description: Total (RAW) capacity of Stone cluster in bytes

item.name: Total number of objects
item.description: Total number of objects in Stone cluster

item.name: Total bytes used
item.description: Total bytes used in Stone cluster

item.name: Stone Write bandwidth
item.description: Global write bandwidth

item.name: Stone Write operations
item.description: Global write operations per second

trigger_prototype.name: Stone OSD osd.{#OSD} is near full: {ITEM.VALUE}%

trigger.name: Stone cluster in ERR state
trigger.description: Stone cluster is in ERR state

trigger.description: Issue a trigger if Stone cluster is in WARN state for >1h

trigger.description: Amount of OSDs in IN state changed
